name: The Orville - 2D Rescue
description:
The Orville - 2D Rescue

Produced by: Phoenix Games

A fun, short, RPG which gives you the experience of joining the crew on board the starship USS Orville. Join them in their adventures, help solve problems, and become a valued member on board the weirdest ship in the union. 

Leave comments and suggestions below. And keep an eye out for new episodes, who knows, maybe you'll be in the next one?

Thank you for all your support =)
